verses.verse: Surely <WH3588> there is a vein <WH4161> for the silver, <WH3701> and a place <WH4725> for gold <WH2091> where they fine <WH2212> it.
Iron <WH1270> is taken <WH3947> out of the earth, <WH6083> and brass <WH5154> is molten <WH6694> out of the stone. <WH68>
He sets <WH7760> an end <WH7093> to darkness, <WH2822> and searches <WH2713> out all <WH3605> perfection: <WH8503> the stones <WH68> of darkness, <WH652> and the shadow <WH6757> of death. <WH6757>
The flood <WH5158> breaks <WH6555> out from the inhabitant; <WH1481> even the waters forgotten <WH7911> of the foot: <WH7272> they are dried <WH1809> up, they are gone <WH5128> away from men. <WH582>
As for the earth, <WH776> out of it comes <WH3318> bread: <WH3899> and under <WH8478> it is turned <WH2015> up as it were fire. <WH784>
The stones <WH68> of it are the place <WH4725> of sapphires: <WH5601> and it has dust <WH6083> of gold. <WH2091>
There is a path <WH5410> which no <WH3808> fowl <WH5861> knows, <WH3045> and which the vulture's <WH344> eye <WH5869> has not seen: <WH7805>
The lion's <WH7830> whelps <WH1121> have not trodden <WH1869> it, nor <WH3808> the fierce <WH7826> lion <WH7826> passed <WH5710> by it.
He puts <WH7971> forth <WH7971> his hand <WH3027> on the rock; <WH2496> he overturns <WH2015> the mountains <WH2022> by the roots. <WH8328>
He cuts <WH1234> out rivers <WH2975> among the rocks; <WH6697> and his eye <WH5869> sees <WH7200> every <WH3605> precious <WH3366> thing.
He binds <WH2280> the floods <WH5104> from overflowing; <WH1065> and the thing that is hid <WH8587> brings <WH3318> he forth <WH3318> to light. <WH216>
But where <WH370> shall wisdom <WH2451> be found? <WH4672> and where <WH335> <WH2088> is the place <WH4725> of understanding? <WH998>
Man <WH582> knows <WH3045> not the price <WH6187> thereof; neither <WH3808> is it found <WH4672> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>
The depth <WH8415> said, <WH559> It is not in me: and the sea <WH3220> said, <WH559> It is not with me.
It cannot <WH3808> be gotten <WH5414> for gold, <WH5458> neither <WH3808> shall silver <WH3701> be weighed <WH8254> for the price <WH4242> thereof.
It cannot <WH3808> be valued <WH5541> with the gold <WH3800> of Ophir, <WH211> with the precious <WH3368> onyx, <WH7718> or the sapphire. <WH5601>
The gold <WH2091> and the crystal <WH2137> cannot <WH3808> equal <WH6186> it: and the exchange <WH8545> of it shall not be for jewels <WH3627> of fine gold. <WH6337>
No <WH3808> mention <WH2142> shall be made of coral, <WH7215> or of pearls: <WH1378> for the price <WH4901> of wisdom <WH2451> is above rubies. <WH6443>
The topaz <WH6357> of Ethiopia <WH3568> shall not equal <WH6186> it, neither <WH3808> shall it be valued <WH5541> with pure <WH2889> gold. <WH3800>
From where <WH370> then comes <WH935> wisdom? <WH2451> and where <WH335> is the place <WH4725> of understanding? <WH998>
Seeing it is hid <WH5956> from the eyes <WH5869> of all <WH3605> living, <WH2416> and kept <WH5641> close <WH5641> from the fowls <WH5775> of the air. <WH8064>
Destruction <WH11> and death <WH4194> say, <WH559> We have heard <WH8085> the fame <WH8088> thereof with our ears. <WH241>
God <WH430> understands <WH995> the way <WH1870> thereof, and he knows <WH3045> the place <WH4725> thereof.
For he looks <WH5027> to the ends <WH7098> of the earth, <WH776> and sees <WH7200> under <WH8478> the whole <WH3605> heaven; <WH8064>
To make <WH6213> the weight <WH4948> for the winds; <WH7307> and he weighs <WH8505> the waters <WH4325> by measure. <WH4060>
When he made <WH6213> a decree <WH2706> for the rain, <WH4306> and a way <WH1870> for the lightning <WH2385> of the thunder: <WH6963>
Then <WH227> did he see <WH7200> it, and declare <WH5608> it; he prepared <WH3559> it, yes, <WH1571> and searched <WH2713> it out.
And to man <WH120> he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2005> the fear <WH3374> of the LORD, <WH136> that is wisdom; <WH2451> and to depart <WH5493> from evil <WH7451> is understanding. <WH998>
